entries.title: KTL_<FLAG>
entries.subtitle: Config
entries.content: Set any ktl CLI flag via environment (hyphens become underscores). Example: KTL_NAMESPACE=default.

entries.title: KTL_AUTHFILE
entries.subtitle: Registry
entries.content: Path to a container registry auth file for `ktl build` (containers-auth.json).

entries.title: KTL_BUILDKIT_CACHE
entries.subtitle: Build
entries.content: Configure BuildKit cache import/export for `ktl build`.

entries.title: KTL_BUILDKIT_HOST
entries.subtitle: Build
entries.content: Override the BuildKit address used by `ktl build`.

entries.title: KTL_CAPTURE_BATCH_SIZE
entries.subtitle: Capture
entries.content: Capture recorder flush batch size.

entries.title: KTL_CAPTURE_FLUSH_MS
entries.subtitle: Capture
entries.content: Capture recorder flush interval in milliseconds.

entries.title: KTL_CAPTURE_QUEUE_SIZE
entries.subtitle: Capture
entries.content: Capture recorder in-memory queue size.

entries.title: KTL_CONFIG
entries.subtitle: Config
entries.content: Path to the ktl config file.

entries.title: KTL_DOCKER_CONFIG
entries.subtitle: Build
entries.content: Override Docker config directory for Buildx fallback (equivalent to DOCKER_CONFIG).

entries.title: KTL_DOCKER_CONTEXT
entries.subtitle: Build
entries.content: Docker context to use for Buildx fallback (when provisioning a Docker-backed BuildKit builder).

entries.title: KTL_FEATURE_<FLAG>
entries.subtitle: Features
entries.content: Enable an experimental feature flag (repeatable via env). Example: KTL_FEATURE_DEPLOY_PLAN_HTML_V3=1.

entries.title: KTL_KUBE_LOG_LEVEL
entries.subtitle: Logging
entries.content: Kubernetes client-go verbosity (klog -v). At >=6 enables HTTP request/response tracing.

entries.title: KTL_PROFILE
entries.subtitle: Profiling
entries.content: Enable profiling modes for ktl itself (e.g. startup writes CPU/heap profiles to the working directory).

entries.title: KTL_REGISTRY_AUTH_FILE
entries.subtitle: Registry
entries.content: Alternate registry auth file path for `ktl build`.

entries.title: KTL_SANDBOX_CONFIG
entries.subtitle: Sandbox
entries.content: Path to the sandbox policy configuration file.

entries.title: KTL_SANDBOX_DISABLE
entries.subtitle: Sandbox
entries.content: Disable sandbox execution where supported (set to 1).

entries.title: KTL_SECRET_CONFIG
entries.subtitle: Secrets
entries.content: Path to a secrets provider config file for resolving secret:// references.

entries.title: KTL_SECRET_PROVIDER
entries.subtitle: Secrets
entries.content: Default secret provider name for resolving secret:// references in ktl apply/plan.

entries.title: KTL_STACK_ALLOW_MISSING_DEPS
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Allow missing dependencies when selecting a subset (set to 1/true).

entries.title: KTL_STACK_APPLY_DIFF
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Default `ktl stack apply --diff` value when the flag is not provided (set to 1/true).

entries.title: KTL_STACK_APPLY_DRY_RUN
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Default `ktl stack apply --dry-run` value when the flag is not provided (set to 1/true).

entries.title: KTL_STACK_CLUSTER
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Default cluster filter for `ktl stack` selection (comma-separated).

entries.title: KTL_STACK_DELETE_CONFIRM_THRESHOLD
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Default delete confirmation threshold for `ktl stack delete` when the flag is not provided.

entries.title: KTL_STACK_FROM_PATH
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Default from-path selector for `ktl stack` selection (comma-separated).

entries.title: KTL_STACK_GIT_INCLUDE_DEPENDENTS
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: When using KTL_STACK_GIT_RANGE, include dependents (set to 1/true).

entries.title: KTL_STACK_GIT_INCLUDE_DEPS
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: When using KTL_STACK_GIT_RANGE, include dependencies (set to 1/true).

entries.title: KTL_STACK_GIT_RANGE
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Default git diff range selector for `ktl stack` selection (example: origin/main...HEAD).

entries.title: KTL_STACK_INCLUDE_DEPENDENTS
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Include dependents in selection expansion (set to 1/true).

entries.title: KTL_STACK_INCLUDE_DEPS
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Include dependencies in selection expansion (set to 1/true).

entries.title: KTL_STACK_INFER_CONFIG_REFS
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Enable inferred ConfigMap/Secret reference edges when inferring deps (set to 1/true).

entries.title: KTL_STACK_INFER_DEPS
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Enable inferred dependencies when not explicitly set via flags (set to 1/true).

entries.title: KTL_STACK_OUTPUT
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Default output format for `ktl stack` commands when --output is not provided (table|json).

entries.title: KTL_STACK_PROFILE
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Default stack profile overlay for `ktl stack ...` when --profile is not provided.

entries.title: KTL_STACK_RELEASE
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Default release selector for `ktl stack` selection (comma-separated).

entries.title: KTL_STACK_RESUME_ALLOW_DRIFT
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Default `ktl stack --allow-drift` value when the flag is not provided (set to 1/true).

entries.title: KTL_STACK_RESUME_RERUN_FAILED
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Default `ktl stack --rerun-failed` value when the flag is not provided (set to 1/true).

entries.title: KTL_STACK_ROOT
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Default stack root for `ktl stack ...` when --root is not provided.

entries.title: KTL_STACK_TAG
entries.subtitle: Stack
entries.content: Default tag selector for `ktl stack` selection (comma-separated).

entries.title: KTL_YES
entries.subtitle: CLI
entries.content: Auto-approve confirmations (equivalent to passing --yes).

entries.title: KUBECONFIG
entries.subtitle: Kubernetes
entries.content: Path to the kubeconfig file (defaults to ~/.kube/config).

entries.title: KUBERNETES_MASTER
entries.subtitle: Kubernetes
entries.content: Address of the Kubernetes API server (overrides kubeconfig).

entries.title: NO_COLOR
entries.subtitle: Output
entries.content: Disable ANSI color output (any non-empty value).

entries.title: --ai
entries.content: Use AI-powered analysis (requires API key)

entries.title: --all
entries.content:
Include internal/legacy variables

Available on: 2 commands

entries.title: --allow-drift
entries.content: Allow rerun even when inputs changed since the plan was written (unsafe)

entries.title: --allow-network
entries.content: Allow network egress when --hermetic is enabled

entries.title: --allow-unpinned-bases
entries.content: Allow unpinned base images (FROM without @sha256 digest) when --hermetic is enabled

entries.title: --apply-plan
entries.content: Apply a previously generated init plan (path or - for stdin)

entries.title: --atomic
entries.content:
Rollback changes if the upgrade fails

Default: true

entries.title: --attest-dir
entries.content: Write generated attestations (SBOM/provenance) to this directory as JSON files (implies --sbom and --provenance; requires OCI layout export)

entries.title: --attestation-file
entries.content:
Attestation filename written inside --out

Default: attestation.json

entries.title: --authfile
entries.content: Path to the authentication file (Docker config.json)

entries.title: --baseline
entries.content: Write plan JSON baseline to this path

entries.title: --build-arg
entries.content: Add a build-time variable (KEY=VALUE)

entries.title: --builder
entries.content:
BuildKit address (override with KTL_BUILDKIT_HOST)

Default: unix:///run/user/501/buildkit/buildkitd.sock

entries.title: --bundle
entries.content:
Write a reproducible plan bundle (.tgz) instead of printing the plan

Available on: 4 commands

entries.title: --bundle-diff-summary
entries.content: Compute and embed a diff summary against the live cluster (requires cluster access)

entries.title: --bundle-file
entries.content:
Bundle filename written inside --out

Default: inputs.tar.gz

entries.title: --cache-dir
entries.content:
Local cache directory for BuildKit metadata

Default: /Users/antonvkrylov/Library/Caches/ktl/buildkit-cache

entries.title: --cache-from
entries.content: Cache import sources (comma-separated key=value pairs)
